I'm not someone who does things the easy way, so I'll brace myself and keep going!

Would you like to download the soundtrack to your Documents/Labyrinths of the World the Wild Side Collector's Edition folder?

Would you like to download this picture to your Documents/Labyrinths of the World the Wild Side Collector's Edition folder?
Do you want to purchase this item?

They are also known as "white-chested bears." They live in forests and can climb the trees very quickly. They eat plants, branches, and leaves, but are capable of attacking any human who poses a danger.

This subspecies is smaller than wolves of Europe and Northern Asian. Their colors range from reddish gray to light red with black-tipped fur. They live in small packs that include a male and a female with their cubs.
Panthers are not actually a separate species of cats, but an entire genus within the cat family. Lions, tigers, leopards, and jaguars are all panthers.

These large deer have towering antlers. Their shaggy coats vary from yellowish brown to dark gray in color. They live in dense forests near water sources. They swim and spend a lot of time in water, especially in the summer.

These large birds have crimson eyes, black and white feathers, and long legs. They inhabit a variety of freshwater wetlands including seasonal and perennial reservoirs and marshes, crop lands, irrigation canals, and rivers.

Elephants are one of the largest animals. For many peoples, they are sacred animals that embody wisdom and power. They are known for taking care of their wounded and youngsters. They live in groups of 15 to 20 and obey an elder female elephant.
These small primates have a tuft of hair on their heads that resemble a hat. They live near villages and temples, but they're adaptable to different terrains, giving preference to woods.
These spectacled cobras, called the Queens of Snakes, are both greatly respected and feared as they are extremely venomous. Legends say their hood markings are Buddha's fingerprints.
They're also called barking deer because of their loud and continuous call that resembles a dog's bark. They do not use their short antlers for protection, but instead use their sharp fangs to bite.
Lemurs' eyes are big and round, surrounded by a dark border. Lemurs are one of the most social primates. They communicate with scents and vocalizations.
These civets have short legs and hairy feet. Their colors change depending on age, gender, and season. They are nocturnal and spend most of their day in abandoned burrows made by other animals.

These reptiles inhabit freshwater lakes, rivers, and marshes. They prefer slow-moving, shallow bodies of water. Mugger hatchlings are a pale olive with black spots. They are powerful swimmers that use their tails and hind feet to propel them, change direction, and dive.

This bird is large with fairly broad wings. Most populations of the western marsh harrier are migratory or dispersive. They prefer open habitats, such as farmland and grassland, particularly where these border marshlands.

This beautiful bird has one of the largest tails in the animal world made up of more than 200 feathers that can reach 200 centimeters in length. Dutch sailors were the first to discover them and bring them to Europe. They are birds that live in packs.
This opportunistic carnivore is not afraid to steal the kill of another predator. They are monogamous and males will not only establish dens with females but will also help raise and feed their cubs.
Would you like some interactive help?

The hand indicates items you can pick up. ♥ ♥ Take this Box.
The hand also indicates items you can interact with. ♥ ♥ Select the Bag Lock.

Find all the objects marked yellow in text. ♥♥ Here's one.

Press these buttons to choose the difficulty of the current mini-game.
Press these buttons to read information about the mini-game or restart it. ♥♥ Continue...
Find butterflies in every scene to upgrade the boudoir! ♥♥ This indicator glows when one is in your location.
Find all the animal pictures on stones. ♥♥ Here's the first one.
Find all the morphing figurines. ♥♥ Here's the first one.
An arrow appears when you can move to another location. ♥♥ Go forward.
Some characters will tell you useful information. ♥♥Talk to Nanda.
Mokhan! I came to you to hear your prophecy about my fate and lands!
Then behold, Jagan! A mighty and feared ruler you'll become, erelong a human's hand will strike you numb.
What?! I'll never let that happen!
What do you need to help me reverse the prophecy? I'll do anything you say.
Happy Birthday, brother! Here's your gift from me. Come on... open it!
Yes, you should take a break from all the Seeker's business and finally go on vacation! Don't worry, I'll take care of the house and your cat while you're away.
So, everyone's here? Let's go to the Palace of Winds and listen to the legend of Princess Manu.
Hey! I hope you're having fun! So, where are you now?
The Palace of Winds? Wow! Would you take a photo for me? I'd really love to see it!
Princess Manu was last seen in your Valley, Nanda. Tell me where she is now!
Even if she were here, I'd never tell you. Now get out! A coward like you isn't welcome in my lands.
You will regret denying me, the strongest of the Tigers! Behold my power!
Hello, human. I'm Nanda, the Rani of the Elephant Valley. Jagan badly hurt me... Please, help me. Bring me the fruit of life's potion. Then I'll-- Ohh...
Hey! I'm Harish. I'm sorry I stole your watch. Here it is. I just wanted to lure a Seeker into our world to help us.
The situation in the jungle became dangerous after the Tiger King, Jagan heard a prophecy about his death.
Nanda will tell you more about it. Please, cure her!
Thank you! The prophecy about Jagan said that he would die at the hands of a human. It must mean Princess Manu, the only human in this world.
I found Manu as a child in the jungle and raised her as my own daughter. She was so kind and generous to animals that we made her our Princess, the ruler of the Animal World.
Now Jagan's hunting for Manu. He'll perform a special ritual to reverse the prophecy that will kill her! It will make him the new ruler of our world!
Please, find and save Manu. Then she'll help you get back to your world. Now, go to the Snakes Path. She's looking for shelter there.
Look around my tent. Maybe you'll find something useful there.
Your prophecy made Jagan start hunting for Princess Manu, but I won't let anyone hurt her! Get out of my way, or I'll tear you to pieces!
You can't intimidate me now that I'm under Jagan's protection!
It's so beautiful here, I- Oh, it's Margaret! I should answer this.
Oh no! That little thief took Margaret's gift! I need to get it back.
I could climb right up there if I had some rope.
There's the monkey that took my watch! I need to get it back.
Now I can take notes to remember my trip!
Hello! Would you like to buy a surprise box? It's only four rupees and it's full of souvenirs from India!
I've already bought a souvenir from him.
I could burn incense sticks here.
What beautiful earrings! Hmmm, this could be useful.
He needs my ticket to start the tour. I bet I put it in my backpack.
There's something in the fire. I need to put it out to see what it is.
I could burn my hands! I'd better put out the fire first.
The fire's out, but it's still too hot to touch.
Oops, it broke! I might be able to open it, but I need something thin.
India is full of myths and legends.
Some of the feathers are broken off.
How could that tiny box hold all this?! It's another world wonder!
Just imagine if that window were real!
I should find my ticket. I don't want to miss the tour!
Where am I? Is this still India? I can't believe I'm saying this, but I should talk to that elephant.
Now I'm starting to understand. I need to find Princess Manu.
I need to prepare a potion before it's too late!
The Elephant Valley will be grateful to you for saving Nanda.
I know the fruit of life grows near water.
It won't let me pass. Maybe it needs to see this symbol.
I must gather everything for a henna tattoo.
I saw Margaret doing something like that to her hands. I could also give it a try.
He looks hungry. I bet he would move to hunt some bugs.
I hope I don't get lost here.
I wonder what happened to the ladder.
I should follow the instructions carefully.
I have to clean it off and repair it.
Monkeys often steal and people are used to it. Never punish a monkey for theft, or it'll steal your soul.
Palace of Winds is famous for its large amount of windows: 953! Legends say that one of them is a portal to otherworldly India.
Only four drops can cure a wound, and no more or no less, otherwise it turns into poison!

Seekers used to visit this place, but this world was quite dangerous, so they never stayed for long. I, for one, love this place and the local animals, especially Nanda. She's the Rani of the Elephant Valley. That means she's the Queen! ♥ Princess Manu
Fill the central flask with the correct amount of potion, according to the note on the left. Select a flask to pour from, then select another flask to pour the potion into.
Get to Snakes Path through the portal.

#fff7ff26*®id_ho_101_f_1_india®India* is an amazing country. Look around. There are a #fff7ff26*®id_ho_101_f_1_thousand®thousand* windows in this palace, almost as many as there are legends in India. Focus with your #fff7ff26*®id_ho_101_f_1_eye®eyes* and ears, and I'll tell you one of them.

Of the windows in #fff7ff26*®id_ho_101_f_2_door®the palace*, one leads to a parallel world where power is kept in the #fff7ff26*®id_ho_101_f_2_hands®hands* of animals: #fff7ff26*®id_ho_101_f_2_elephant®elephants*, panthers, monkeys, and more.

Everyone lives in perfect harmony. #fff7ff26*®id_ho_101_f_3_papaya®Papaya* grows abundantly in the gardens, and the rivers are full of #fff7ff26*®id_ho_101_f_3_fish®fish*. This all happened after the human #fff7ff26*®id_ho_101_f_3_crown®Princess* Manu appeared in their world.

She stopped the eternal #fff7ff26*®id_ho_101_f_4_dagger®wars* between #fff7ff26*®id_ho_101_f_4_fang®fangs* and hooves and showed the animals that fighting leads nowhere. Since then, friendship, #fff7ff26*®id_ho_101_f_4_love®love*, and joy have ruled in that world.
Here, take this as a souvenir.
I can't quite make out the country names.
Some perfume might ward them off.
It's a bit dusty. I need something to wipe it clean.
